attributes.action: stop Manchester Congestion Charging from happening
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The AGMA (Association of Greater Manchester Authorities) has voted unanimously in favour of an ill thought out plan to introduce congestion charging to Greater Manchester. 

This will kill local business in the area of the charging and, by pushing traffic into the surrounding residential areas to avoid the charges, increase road traffic accidents especially those involving children.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to " stop Manchester Congestion Charging from happening."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14706.asp

Prime Minister's Office
